meta.name: 尚山 / Sheung Shan
meta.about: Sheung Shan exists to create the finest outdoor accessories.
meta.single_line_address: No.234 Tai Nan Street, Sham Shui Po, Kowloon, 852 香港，香港

meta.name: 尚山 / Sheung Shan
meta.about: 登山/攀岩不單只是一種運動，而是一種生活態度。當離開城市，從山野中踏出第一步，所有的煩惱便會拋諸腦後。我們享受沿途的風光，朋友間的分享，互相的扶持，在喧鬧聲中彼此建立。我們相信每個喜愛山的人都有他們對山的看法和故事。尚山希望可以成為一個平台分享不同登山者的故事。

meta.name: 尚山SheungShan
meta.about:
For us hiking & climbing is more than a sport, it’s our way of life. Too many people live their lives only looking forward to the two-day weekend. Only by embracing the outdoors are we able to appreciate what a wonderful world we are living in. 
Sheung Shan is the home for those who share our vision. 
The home to share our stories and experiences with one another.

address.zh: 九龍 深水埗 大南街 234號 尚山岩舘
